DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate whether combine interval training skim milk supplementation result improve glucose control marker cardiovascular health people type 2 diabetes . Participants complete supervise interval training three time week 12 week training period consume skim-milk , whey/casein protein drink , placebo beverage contain calorie vitamins/minerals immediately 1 hour training session . After twelve week participant repeat baseline test examine effect intervention glucose control , fitness , blood vessel function , body composition , blood marker inflammation .
DOC.brief_title: Milk Plus Exercise : A Novel Strategy Treat Diabetes .
DOC.criteria: Aged 40 75 . Diagnosed type 2 diabetes 6 month . On stable medication last 6 month Type 2 diabetes control exogenous insulin Uncontrolled hypertension ( blood pressure > 160/90 mmHg ) History heart disease , myocardial infarction stroke Any contraindication exercise
